name: extract_bridge_data_v2
description: Extracts structured bridge design data aligned to steel_girder_bridge5.json (English keys and nesting). All numeric fields must be numbers-as-strings without units; use null if missing.

spacing_x.description: Transverse spacing between adjacent girders in mm. From 横断間隔長 table, use ONLY the 'G-1～G-2' column value (e.g., 2979 or 6700). NOT the sum/合計 column.

spacing_z.description: Longitudinal spacing between panel points in mm. From 主桁格間長 table

length.description: Girder span length in mm. From 主桁支間長 table (e.g., 35000)

num_girders.description: Number of main girders. Count G-1, G-2, etc. labels

top_flange_width.description: Upper flange width in mm. From 'UFLG PL 680 * 31', width is 680

web_height.description: Web plate height in mm. From 主桁腹板高 table or 'WEB PL 2700 * 15', height is 2700

bottom_flange_width.description: Lower flange width in mm. From 'LFLG PL 680 * 31', width is 680

top_flange_thickness.description: Upper flange thickness in mm. From 'UFLG PL 680 * 31', thickness is 31

web_thickness.description: Web plate thickness in mm. From 'WEB PL 2700 * 15', thickness is 15

bottom_flange_thickness.description: Lower flange thickness in mm. From 'LFLG PL 680 * 31', thickness is 31

x_offset.description: X coordinate offset of first girder in mm. From 主桁格点座標 table, first X座標 value (e.g., 600)

length.description: Deck length in mm, usually same as girder span length

width.description: Total deck width in mm. Use the '合計' (total) column value from 横断間隔長 table (e.g., 4256 or 11300)

thickness.description: Deck slab thickness in mm. From '床版' or '床版厚' (e.g., 350)

crossbeams.description: Crossbeam (横桁) dimensions from §５．横桁の設計 section ONLY - NOT from 対傾構 or 横構 sections

use_crossbeams.description: true if crossbeams (横桁/中間横桁) are used

thickness.description: Crossbeam WEB thickness in mm. From '横桁の設計→断面の決定' section: 'WEB PL 1250 * 9' means thickness=9. Or from H-beam 'H 700*300*13*24' = 13

length.description: Crossbeam span length in mm. From '固定点間距離 L' in 横桁の設計 section, or G-1～G-2 value from 横断間隔長 table

height.description: Crossbeam WEB height in mm. From '横桁の設計→断面の決定': 'WEB PL 1250 * 9' means height=1250. Or from H-beam 'H 700*300*13*24' = 700. NOT main girder height!

spacing_z.description: Spacing between crossbeams along bridge length in mm. From 主桁格間長 table, e.g., 8700 or 8800

num_cross_girders.description: Number of crossbeam locations. Count rows in 格点座標 or 横断 tables, typically 5 for a simple span
